altername_name: SQIJ'D!: Sqij and the Tree of Ener
name: SQIJ'D!
overview: SQIJ'D! (also called SQIJ'D!: Sqij and the Tree of Ener) is an unofficial sequel to one of the most infamous ZX Spectrum games. The game was developed by John Blythe and Graz and published by Monument Microgames on January 3, 2020. The bird is back, and not all is well in paradise! The Ener tree that Sqij created, all those years ago, has enveloped the planet, demanding you bring it the food it needs to thrive. But you swear that you'll not be its lackey forever. You have a plan. One that will set you up as the most powerful bird in the universe!
